name: Visualmodo Elements
author: Visualmodo

sections.description:
Visualmodo Elements allows you to create amazing pages from ready to use templates with a single click only.

Bundled with super useful WPBakery Page Builder elements with a bunch of options to achieve any design with all the power of WPBakery Page Builder for free. In addition to elegant and modern components for your page content.

You can build amazing professional layouts for your site with tons of powerful shortcodes. Works with latest WPBakery Page Builder v5.4+

Visualmodo Elements Addon Features

  • Fully customizable elements
  • Custom icons upload and management options
  • Complete color customization option
  • Advanced options panel
  • Complete color customization option
  • Drag and drop page builder components
  • Fully responsive visual elements
sections.installation:
Install Visualmodo Elements as a regular WordPress plugin. Firstly, you need to install and activate the WPBakery Page Builder WordPress plugin, this installation it’s essential for a WPBakery Page Builder addons usage.

Secondly, you can download the Visualmodo Elements .ZIP files here and got to WordPress Dashboard. Plugins. Add New. Upload. Hit ‘Chose file’. Select ‘visualmodo-elements.zip’ file. Upload and activate the plugin.

Visualmodo Elements works like other page builder addon plugin. Go to ‘Pages. ‘Add new’ then click on WPBakery Page builder then click on Add Element. So you should see Page Builder Addons tab as Name “Visualmodo Elements” on Menu Top. Finally, click on it you will see a growing elements list of all the plugin drag and drop components.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Update – Preparing plugin to be deactivated and replaced by Borderless. Step 1 of 3.

1.0.1

  • Fixed – Removed $thickness in line 70 on progress-bar.php
  • Update – Shortcode base, changed adding wpbakery for future support to Elementor

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
